properties.areaDesc: Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Sheep Range
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 1:20PM PST until February 22 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations
of up to 7 inches. Up to a foot of snow expected above 8000
feet.

* WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon.

* WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to snow covered roads in
the Spring Mountains, including Kyle and Lee Canyons.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET
